com.opengamma.strata.engine.marketdata

Interface CalculationMarketData

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultCalculationMarketData

    public interface CalculationMarketData
    A source of market data provided to an engine function and used for a calculation across multiple scenarios.

    The set of data provided by this interface is a subset of the set provided by ScenarioMarketData. For example a function might request a USD discounting curve, but the scenario market data can contain multiple curve groups, each with a USD discounting curve.

    Typically a set of MarketDataRules are used to choose the item of market data from the global set.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T,K extends MarketDataKey<T>>
      T      		 getGlobalValue(K key)
      Returns a single value that is valid for all scenarios.

      Returns the number of scenarios.
      LocalDateDoubleTimeSeries getTimeSeries(ObservableKey key)
      Returns a time series of market data values.
      List<LocalDate> getValuationDates()
      Returns the valuation dates of the scenarios, one for each scenario.
      <T> List<T> getValues(MarketDataKey<T> key)
      Returns a list of market data values, one from each scenario.

    • Method Detail

      • getValuationDates

        List<LocalDate> getValuationDates()
        Returns the valuation dates of the scenarios, one for each scenario.
        Returns:
        the valuation dates of the scenarios, one for each scenario

      • getScenarioCount

        int getScenarioCount()
        Returns the number of scenarios.
        Returns:
        the number of scenarios

      • getValues

        <T> List<T> getValues(MarketDataKey<T> key)
        Returns a list of market data values, one from each scenario.

        The date of the market data is the same as the valuation date of the scenario.

        Type Parameters:
        T - type of the market data
        Parameters:
        key - a key identifying the market data
        Returns:
        a list of market data values, one from each scenario

      • getTimeSeries

        LocalDateDoubleTimeSeries getTimeSeries(ObservableKey key)
        Returns a time series of market data values.

        Time series are not affected by scenarios, therefore there is a single time series for each key which is shared between all scenarios.

        Parameters:
        key - a key identifying the market data
        Returns:
        a list of market data time series

      • getGlobalValue

        <T,K extends MarketDataKey<T>> T getGlobalValue(K key)
        Returns a single value that is valid for all scenarios.

        This allows optimizations such as pre-processing of items market data to create a single composite value that can be processed more efficiently.

        Type Parameters:
        T - type of the market data
        K - type of the market data key
        Parameters:
        key - a key identifying the market data
        Returns:
        the market data value
